name: HighGarden Leaf
description:
Greetings lads/lassies,
My second project 'HighGarden Leaf' is a RPG-ish arcade game that revolves around a not so ordinary leaf that has to venture through the years for the rest of its life.
Credits to Adrian von Ziegler (https://www.youtube.com/user/AdrianvonZiegler) for the Celtic Fantasy Music - Hymn to Annûmara that I'm using for this game.

Leave your review and critics in the comment section. I hope you'll enjoy the game !

To move use W,A,S,D or LeftArrow,UpArrow,RightArrow,DownArrow.

18/9/15 - Added 'pause' function because indeed it is needed
